label: LMDS
description: Landmark MDS dimensionality reduction on the Spearman distance.

label: MNN
description: Mutual nearest neighbors correction followed by PCA.

label: PCA
description: PCA dimensionality reduction.

label: totalVI
description: totalVI: joint probabilistic modeling with Total Variational Inference

label: UMAP
description: UMAP dimensionality reduction on the Euclidean distance.

label: Normal Dist.
description: Generate a random embedding from a normal distribution.

label: SolutionEmbedding
description: Generate an embedding from the solution object.

label: Zeros
description: Generate an embedding containing only zero values.

label: Babel+KNN
description: Predict test expression with BABEL and match cells with KNN.

label: LMDS+KNNR+KNN
description: Perform LMDS+Pearson DR, predict embedding with KNN regression, and match cells with KNN.

label: LMDS+NN+GA
description: Perform LMDS+Pearson DR, predict embedding with Keras NN, and match cells with a GA to minimise pairwise distances.

label: LMDS+NN+KNN
description: Perform LMDS+Pearson DR, predict embedding with Keras NN, and match cells with KNN.

label: MNN+NN+GA
description: Perform DR with MNN, predict embedding with Keras NN, and match cells with a GA to minimise pairwise distances.

label: Procrustes+KNN
description: Perform DR with Procrustes, and match cells with a GA to minimise pairwise distances.

label: Constant
description: Returns constant weights between all mod1 profiles and the first 1000 mod2 profiles.

label: Random Pairing
description: Generates random pairings weights drawn from a uniform distribution.

label: Solution
description: Returns the ground-truth pairing.

label: Zeros
description: Generates a pairing matrix with all zero weights.

label: BABEL
description: Learn a deep-learning model with BABEL.

label: KNNR
description: K-nearest neighbor regression.

label: Linear Models
description: Linear model regression.

label: Random Forests
description: Random forest regression.

label: Mean per gene
description: Returns the mean expression value per gene.

label: Random Profiles
description: Returns random training profiles.

label: Solution
description: Returns the ground-truth solution.

label: Zeros
description: Returns a prediction consisting of all zeros.
